title: Customer Signup Success
description: Verify that a new customer can successfully sign up using valid details and receives appropriate confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to customer signup page
Enter valid customer details (email, password, name)
Submit signup form
Check that signup is successful and user is redirected to dashboard

title: Customer Login Success
description: Verify customer can login with valid credentials and receive JWT token with correct role assigned.

steps.description: Navigate to customer login page
Input valid email and password
Submit login form
Check login success and JWT token received with customer role

title: Customer Login Failure - Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails with appropriate error message when invalid credentials are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to customer login page
Enter invalid email or password
Submit login form
Check login failure with clear error message displayed

title: Customer Order Creation with Distance-Based Pricing
description: Verify customer can create a delivery order using distance-based pricing and order is persisted with correct pricing.

steps.description: Login as customer
Navigate to order creation page
Select distance-based pricing option
Input valid pickup and drop locations (single drop)
Submit order and confirm pricing calculation
Verify order saved in database with correct distance pricing and status 'pending'

title: Customer Order Creation with Per-Box Pricing and Multi-Drop (Retail)
description: Validate order creation with per-box pricing and up to 4 drops for retail customers, pricing and details saved correctly.

steps.description: Login as retail customer
Create order with per-box pricing
Add pickup location and up to 4 drop locations
Input box quantities per drop
Submit order
Confirm order record includes multiple drops and correct per-box pricing

title: Customer Order Creation Multi-Drop Unlimited for Corporate
description: Ensure corporate customers can create orders with unlimited drops and complex pricing is handled correctly.

steps.description: Login as corporate customer
Create order with per-box or distance pricing
Add more than 4 drops (test at least 5 drops)
Submit order
Verify order persists with all drops and pricing calculated appropriately

title: Order Tracking UI with Timeline and Map
description: Check that customers can view an interactive timeline and Google Maps based tracking for their orders with updated statuses.

steps.description: Login as customer
Open existing order details
Ensure timeline shows correct order status progression
Map displays pickup and drop points accurately with current driver location

title: Payment Processing with M-Pesa STK Push
description: Validate that customers can pay using M-Pesa STK Push and payment status is reflected in order and transaction records.

steps.description: Create a new order requiring payment
Select M-Pesa payment method and initiate STK Push
Verify payment prompt is received on M-Pesa app
Complete payment on M-Pesa
Verify payment confirmation is recorded and order status updated to paid

title: Payment Processing with Wallet
description: Verify customers can pay using wallet balance, wallet balance updates correctly, and order status changes.

steps.description: Ensure customer wallet has sufficient balance
Create and pay for order using wallet option
Confirm wallet balance decrements by order amount
Order status changes to paid

title: Admin Login and Role-Based Access
description: Ensure admins can log in and have access restricted only to admin UI and API endpoints.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter valid admin credentials
Submit login form
Verify access to admin dashboard with no access to customer/driver pages

title: Admin Panel UI Layout and Navigation
description: Verify the three-panel layout of header, collapsible sidebar, and main content rendered consistently with functional navigation menus.

steps.description: Login as admin
Observe header with correct branding and user menu
Sidebar is collapsible and hierarchical menus expand/collapse as expected
Navigate through sidebar menu to orders, drivers, customers
Main content area updates correctly with data tables

title: Admin Order Management - Search, Filter, Selection, Expansion
description: Check admin can search, filter, select, and expand rows in order data tables with tabbed detail view loading correct data.

steps.description: Login as admin
Access Orders management page
Apply search and filter criteria
Filtered order list displays relevant results
Select multiple orders using checkboxes
Row selection state is maintained
Expand an order row to view master-detail tabbed interface
Order details and tabs load expected data correctly

title: Admin POD Review and Approval Workflow
description: Verify admins can view PODs, approve or reject with comments, and system updates POD status and audit logs accordingly.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to POD management page
Select a pending POD for review
Approve or reject POD with optional comment
POD status updates accordingly in database
Audit log entry records approval/rejection action

title: Driver Login and Role-Based Access Restriction
description: Drivers can log in via mobile app, receive JWT tokens securely, and have access restricted to driver-specific functionality.

steps.description: Open driver mobile app
Input valid driver credentials
Submit login request to backend
Verify driver is logged in and unauthorized access blocked on non-driver routes

title: Driver App Order List and Status Tracking
description: Drivers can view ongoing and completed orders lists with detailed progress steps for each order, reflecting real-time updates.

steps.description: Login as driver on mobile app
Navigate to order list screen
Ongoing and completed orders are displayed separately
Select an ongoing order
Order progress steps show accurate current status

title: Driver Map Navigation Accuracy
description: Verify the driver app loads correct navigation routes to pickup and drop-off points using integrated maps.

steps.description: Login as driver
Open assigned order with navigation
Map shows correct route to pickup location
Start navigation and confirm directions
Map updates dynamically as driver moves

title: Driver POD Upload with Camera and Signature
description: Drivers can upload proof of delivery photos and digitally sign after dropoff, POD uploads are verified and recorded.

steps.description: Driver selects completed order
Open POD upload section
Capture photo using device camera
Capture digital signature
Submit POD upload
POD is saved and linked to order with correct timestamps

title: Driver Wallet Balance and Withdrawal Request
description: Driver can view wallet balance, transaction history and submit withdrawal requests which appear in admin panel for approval.

steps.description: Login as driver
Navigate to wallet section
Current wallet balance and transaction history are displayed correctly
Submit withdrawal request for available balance
Request is created with correct amount and status 'pending'
Login as admin and verify withdrawal request appears for approval

title: API Endpoint Security and Role-Based Middleware Enforcement
description: Verify backend API endpoints are protected by JWT authentication and role-based middleware restricts unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API endpoints without authentication
Access is denied with appropriate 401/403 error
Login as different roles (customer, admin, driver)
Attempt to call admin-only and driver-only endpoints
Requests succeed or fail according to the user role and middleware rules

title: Data Display Consistency - Date, Time, and Currency Formatting
description: Validate that all dates, times, and currency values in customer panel, admin panel, and driver app use standardized formats: DD/MM/YYYY, HH:MM:SS, Ksh.

steps.description: Login to all platform components as appropriate role
Navigate to views showing transaction dates, order timestamps, wallets, and prices
Dates display as DD/MM/YYYY
Times display as HH:MM:SS
Currency values show prefix 'Ksh' and correct formatting

title: System Health Endpoint Returns Correct Status
description: Verify the /health endpoint responds with status indicating backend service availability and readiness.

steps.description: Send GET request to /health endpoint
Response status is success (e.g. 200 OK)
Response message indicates system health and uptime

title: Audit Logs Capture Critical Actions
description: Check that key system actions such as user creation, order updates, POD approvals, and withdrawal requests are logged with timestamp, user, and action details.

steps.description: Perform critical actions as different roles: create user, modify order, approve POD, submit withdrawal
Access audit logs via admin interface or direct database query
Verify log entries include action type, user ID, timestamp, and relevant details

title: Multi-Role Logout Functionality
description: Confirm that users of all roles (customer, admin, driver) can successfully log out invalidating their JWT tokens and restricting further API access.

steps.description: Log in as a user (customer, admin, or driver)
Invoke logout API endpoint
Token is invalidated
Attempt to access protected endpoint with old token
Access is denied with unauthorized error
